title: Corki skin idea "Vimana Corki"
body:
Vimana c{{champion:42}}  would be  {{champion:42}} flying around in a chariot that has wings.


As for the  way it would look:
.{{champion:42}} would have a Viking outfit aka Viking helmet with horns ect
.He would be riding a small golden chariot with wings

As for abilities
.Phosphorus  Bomb: creates balls of light
.Valkayrie : The chariots wings  spread out  and create  a trail of light behind corki
.Gatling gun: visually  the same  except the  more of a yellow colour
.missile barrage : creates horse of light that charge towards the enemy

any more ideas feel free to add
